choose.when: SELECT o.no, to_char(o."date", 'HH24:MI') as date, p.name, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) < 0 THEN EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) + 101 ELSE EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) + 2 END as age, o."desc", o.orderstate_no, os.state, o.patient_no, p.gender, p.rrn, p.phone FROM patient p, "order" o, order_state os WHERE p.no = o.patient_no AND o.orderstate_no = os.no AND to_char(o."date", 'YYYY-MM-DD')= #{date} AND o.orderstate_no = #{orderstateNo}
choose.otherwise: SELECT o.no, to_char(o."date", 'HH24:MI') as date, p.name, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) < 0 THEN EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) + 101 ELSE EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) + 2 END as age, o."desc", o.orderstate_no, os.state, o.patient_no, p.gender, p.rrn, p.phone FROM patient p, "order" o, order_state os WHERE p.no = o.patient_no AND o.orderstate_no = os.no AND to_char(o."date", 'YYYY-MM-DD')= #{date} ORDER BY (CASE WHEN o.orderstate_no = 5 THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) , o."date"

choose.when: SELECT o.no, to_char(o."date", 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as date, p.name, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) < 0 THEN EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) + 101 ELSE EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) + 2 END as age, o.patient_no, p.gender, p.rrn, p.phone FROM patient p, "order" o WHERE p.no = o.patient_no AND o.orderstate_no = 1 ORDER BY o."date"
choose.otherwise: SELECT o.no, to_char(o."date", 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as date, p.name, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) < 0 THEN EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) + 101 ELSE EXTRACT(year FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, to_date(SUBSTRING(rrn, 1, 6), 'YYMMDD'))) + 2 END as age, o.patient_no, p.gender, p.rrn, p.phone FROM patient p, "order" o WHERE p.no = o.patient_no AND to_char(o."date", 'YYYY-MM-DD')= #{_parameter} AND o.orderstate_no = 1 ORDER BY o."date"

mapper.select: SELECT o.no, o."date", o.patient_no, o.expenses, p.name, p.gender, p.rrn, p.insuarance, p.phone FROM patient p, "order" o WHERE o.patient_no=p.no AND o.no=#{orderNo}

select t1.no as "no", t1.date as "date", t1.expenses as "expenses", t1.desc as "desc", t1.user_no as "user_no", t1.orderstate_no as "orderstate_no", t1.patient_no as "patient_no", t2.name as "patient_name", t3."state" from "order" t1, patient t2, order_state t3 where t1.patient_no = t2."no" and t1.orderstate_no = t3."no" and orderstate_no in (2, 3) order by orderstate_no desc

choose.when: INSERT INTO "order" VALUES (DEFAULT, CAST(to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TIMESTAMP), 7000, #{desc}, #{userNo}, #{orderstateNo}, #{patientVo.no})

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "order" WHERE no = #{orderNo} AND orderstate_no IN (1, 2)
